subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Aston Villa ended a 12-game winless streak, beating Hull by 1-0 in the English Premier League to clinch a berth in next season’s Europa League. John Carew scored his 14th goal of the season in the 34th minute, helping Villa (16-9-10) move into fifth place, 2 points ahead of Everton (15-9-11). Hull created few problems for Brad Friedel, Villa’s American goalkeeper.
